## Exploring human movement, mathematics, and the mind.

I develop computational frameworks to understand how mechanical stress and injury reshape brain structure, movement, and physiological regulation.
My work bridges head impact exposure, neuroimaging, and multimodal wearable data to reveal the latent dynamics of injury, adaptation, and recovery.
